reviewText: The video was only just so, so in production. A little more focusing on Renaud and what he was getting across to people would have been more helpful. Felt this was a sketchy job.
Good advice bit hard to hear with his accent, but overall a good introduction to reasons why we cause cancer in our bodies

Excellent DVD.  I attended several workshops and the DVD has been very helpful to not forget what I have learned and to use it on a daily basis.
I recommended this DVD and a follow up with the author if you have been trying to fight an illness or depression.
